Goal Representation:
['1. Identify and clear any items from the floor that may obstruct vacuuming.', '2. Vacuum the floor
 thoroughly.']

def clear_obstructions_from_floor(floor:item):
    # Function to identify and clear items from the floor
    foreach obstruction: item:
        # Iterate over items identified as movable and close to the floor
        if movable(obstruction) and close(floor, obstruction):
            achieve inside(obstruction, room)
            # Move the obstruction inside the room or a designated storage area

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind floor: item where:
            is_floor(floor)
        # Select the floor to be vacuumed
        clear_obstructions_from_floor(floor)

behavior observe_floor_for_cleaning(floor:item):
    body:
        observe(floor, "Identify areas of the floor that need vacuuming")

behavior __goal__():
    body:
        bind floor: item where:
            is_floor(floor)
        observe_floor_for_cleaning(floor)
